quote: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can't live long enough to make them all yourself. – Eleanor Roosevelt
fact: Since 1978, 37 people have died by Vending Machine`s falling on them.  13 people are killed annually.  All this while trying to shake merchandise out of them. 113 people have been injured.
joke: Why did the half blind man fall in the well? Because he couldn't see that well!
